en: No matter what happens, I am prepared.
zh: 不管发生什么，我都准备好了。

en: I will go cycling even if it rains.
zh: 就算下雨，我也要去骑车。

en: Even though it is raining, he will play golf.
zh: 虽然在下雨，他还是会去打高尔夫。

en: Even if it should rain, I will start tomorrow.
zh: 就算明天下雨，我也会出发。

en: I will go there even if it rains.
zh: 就算下雨，我也要去那儿。

en: I have to go even if it rains.
zh: 就算下雨，我也得去。

en: Even if it rains, I will start early tomorrow morning.
zh: 就算明早下雨，我也要早点出发。

en: Even if it rains, the game will be played.
zh: 就算下雨，比赛也会照常进行。

en: Even if it rains, I'll start.
zh: 就算下雨，我也要开始。

en: The game will be played even if it rains.
zh: 就算下雨，比赛也照样打。

en: The soccer game will be played, even if it rains.
zh: 就算下雨，足球赛也会照常踢。

en: Even though it is raining, I don't care at all.
zh: 虽然在下雨，但我一点都不在乎。

en: Even if it rains, I'll go swimming tomorrow.
zh: 就算明天下雨，我明天也会去游泳。

en: Even if you are not to blame, you should apologize.
zh: 就算不是你的错，你也该道个歉。

en: Such poets as Toson and Hakushu are rare.
zh: 像藤村和白秋这样的诗人很少见。

en: Ball games, such as basketball and ping-pong, are usually played indoors.
zh: 像篮球和乒乓球这种球类运动，通常是在室内进行的。

en: For instance, bowing is peculiar to us, the Japanese.
zh: 比如说，鞠躬是我们日本人特有的习惯。

en: Take, for instance, your family problems.
zh: 拿你的家庭问题来说吧。

en: How many samples, for example?
zh: 举个例子，要多少个样本？

en: For example, he speaks German, French and English.
zh: 比如，他会说德语、法语和英语。

en: For example, Koko was asked to choose a house or a tree for shelter from the rain.
zh: 比如，可可被要求在房子和树之间选一个避雨的地方。

en: For example, they do not have to go to a stadium to see the World Series or the Super Bowl because they can enjoy watching the games in their own living rooms.
zh: 比如，他们不用去体育场看世界大赛或超级碗，因为在自家客厅就能看。

en: Whatever story I tell, Mother believes me.
zh: 不管我讲什么故事，妈妈都相信我。

en: No weather was severe enough to keep him indoors.
zh: 不管天气多恶劣，都拦不住他出门。

en: She paints every day no matter how busy she is.
zh: 不管多忙，她每天都会画画。

en: No matter how long it takes, I will finish the job.
zh: 不管花多长时间，我都会把工作做完。

en: However hard you may study, you can't master English in a year or so.
zh: 不管你多努力，也不可能在一年左右就精通英语。

en: Try as you may, you can't do it in a day.
zh: 就算你再怎么努力，也不可能在一天之内完成。

en: No amount of money can buy happiness.
zh: 再多钱也买不到幸福。

en: No matter what happens, I won't change my mind.
zh: 不管发生什么，我都不会改变主意。

en: Whichever you choose, you cannot lose.
zh: 无论你选哪一个，你都不会输。

en: Whichever bus you may take, you can get to the station.
zh: 不管坐哪趟公交车，你都能到车站。

en: Wherever you may go, you can't succeed without perseverance.
zh: 不管你去哪儿，没有毅力是不会成功的。

en: Go where you will, you can't hope for success without effort.
zh: 不管你去哪儿，不努力是不可能成功的。

en: No matter where you live, you would find it difficult not to laugh at, say, Charlie Chaplin's early films.
zh: 不管你住哪儿，看到查理·卓别林的早期电影，都很难不笑出来。

en: There are few, if any, such men.
zh: 像这种人，如果有的话，也非常少。

en: Even if it is true, it matters little.
zh: 就算那是真的，也没什么大不了。

en: Even if you do not like it, you must take charge of it.
zh: 就算你不喜欢，你也得负责这事。

en: Even if the performance is good, I still say we drop the project.
zh: 就算表现得不错，我还是觉得该放弃这个项目。

en: You must do it even if you don't want to.
zh: 就算不想做，你也得做。

en: Even though you don't like this, you must eat it.
zh: 虽然你不喜欢，但你还是得把它吃了。

en: Even if I were rich, I wouldn't give money to him.
zh: 就算我有钱，我也不会给他。

en: You must do the work, even if you do not like it.
zh: 就算你不喜欢，你也得把这工作做了。

en: Whenever you visit him, you will find him playing video games.
zh: 不管你什么时候去找他，他都在打游戏。

en: The millionaire insisted on acquiring the masterpiece no matter how much it cost.
zh: 那个富翁坚持要买下这件杰作，不管花多少钱。

en: Even if you go far away, let's keep in touch with each other over the phone.
zh: 就算你去了远方，咱们也要常打电话联系。

en: No matter where you go, I'll follow you.
zh: 不管你去哪儿，我都会跟着你。

en: Even if it takes you three years, you must accomplish your goal.
zh: 就算要花三年，你也必须实现目标。

en: Even if it costs 10,000 yen, I must buy the dictionary.
zh: 就算要花一万日元，我也得买下那本词典。

en: Even if it takes me ten years, I am determined to accomplish the job.
zh: 就算要花十年，我也一定要完成这项工作。

en: Were the sun to rise in the west, she would not change her resolution.
zh: 就算太阳从西边出来，她也不会改变主意。

en: Even if you boss attacks you and tells you to go away, you should make your point.
zh: 哪怕老板骂你让你滚，你也得把话说明白。

en: I want to get the word out - even if you don't have a lot of clothes you can enjoy dressing more fashionably by mixing and matching.
zh: 我想告诉大家，就算衣服不多，靠混搭也能穿得很时髦。

en: There is no accounting for tastes.
zh: 萝卜青菜，各有所爱。

en: Tatsuya has some friends who live in New York.
zh: 达也有几个住在纽约的朋友。

en: Because we'll all fall down on the cold ground.
zh: 因为我们都会倒在冰冷的地上。

en: Because you're a sweet and lovely girl.
zh: 因为你是个甜美可爱的女孩子。

en: They live there.
zh: 他们住在那儿。

en: The lights went out just now.
zh: 刚才停电了。

en: I heard a shot just now.
zh: 我刚才听到一声枪响。

en: I've just finished my work.
zh: 我刚忙完。

en: I want you to take back what you said just now.
zh: 我要你收回刚才说的话。

en: A fishing boat put off just now.
zh: 刚才有一条渔船出海了。

en: I've just come back.
zh: 我刚回来。

en: It began raining just now.
zh: 刚才开始下雨了。

en: I only just saw the accident.
zh: 我刚才才看到那场事故。

en: I was just mugged.
zh: 我刚才被抢了。

en: Only one little daughter did they have.
zh: 他们就只有一个小女儿。

en: Not a single word did he say.
zh: 他一个字都没说。

en: A mere 529 spectators watched the game.
zh: 只有区区529名观众看了比赛。

en: No more than 50 people came.
zh: 来了不到50个人。

en: They're only $50 with two cans of shoe polish free of charge.
zh: 只要50块钱，还免费送两罐鞋油。

en: It took little more than an hour.
zh: 也就花了一个多小时。

en: You just messed up once. You don't need to agonize over it.
zh: 你就搞砸了一次，没必要这么纠结。

en: It only costs $10.00!
zh: 只要10块钱！

en: Could you tell me the way to Madame Tussaud's?
zh: 请问杜莎夫人蜡像馆怎么走？

en: A dachshund is a dog from Germany with a very long body and short legs.
zh: 腊肠犬是一种德国狗，身子长长的，腿短短的。

en: Dachshund sausages first became popular in New York, especially at baseball games.
zh: 腊肠香肠最早是在纽约流行起来的，尤其是在棒球比赛的时候。

en: An ostrich does not fly through the air.
zh: 鸵鸟不会飞。

en: Ostriches are incapable of flight.
zh: 鸵鸟是没法飞的。

en: The ostrich has wings, but it cannot fly.
zh: 鸵鸟有翅膀，但是不会飞。

en: An ostrich can not fly any more than a kangaroo can.
zh: 鸵鸟不会飞，就像袋鼠不会飞一样。

en: The panic spread through the district in an instant.
zh: 恐慌一下子就传遍了整个地区。

en: I could see nothing but fog.
zh: 除了大雾，我啥也看不见。

en: Just keep on walking.
zh: 接着往前走就行。

en: You should never look down on a person merely because he is poor.
zh: 你不能只因为人家穷就瞧不起人家。

en: You have only to believe him.
zh: 你只要相信他就行。

en: Just imitate what he does.
zh: 照着他做的学就行。

en: You can just call me Taro.
zh: 你管我叫太郎就行。

en: All you have to do is to cultivate the ability to put yourself in the other fellow's place.
zh: 你只需要学会换位思考就行了。

en: Some read books just to pass time.
zh: 有些人读书只是为了打发时间。

en: She left me simply because I had a small income.
zh: 她离开我纯粹是因为我挣得少。

en: We have a visitor right now. Would you mind waiting for a while?
zh: 我们现在有客人，您能等一会儿吗？

en: We are currently experiencing some turbulence.
zh: 我们现在遇上了气流，有点颠簸。

en: We are full just now.
zh: 我们现在客满了。

en: They are merely different.
zh: 他们只是不一样而已。

en: Fine words butter no parsnips.
zh: 漂亮话又不能当饭吃。

en: Merely to breathe does not mean to live.
zh: 只是喘气可不叫生活。

en: He could do nothing but watch.
zh: 他除了看着，什么也做不了。

en: We can but wait for the results.
zh: 我们只能等结果了。

en: He is just pulling your leg.
zh: 他只是在逗你玩呢。

en: One can no more write good English than one can compose good music, merely by keeping the rules.
zh: 光靠遵守规则是写不出好英文的，就像光靠规则谱不出好曲子一样。

en: You've just been down in the dumps.
zh: 你最近只是心情不太好。

en: Only one careless mistake cost the company millions of dollars.
zh: 就因为一个不小心的错误，公司损失了好几百万。

en: I was waiting all alone.
zh: 我就一个人在那儿等。

en: My sole idea was to get there as fast as possible.
zh: 我当时唯一的想法就是赶紧赶到那儿。

en: The only way was to ask her for help.
zh: 唯一的办法就是找她帮忙。

en: The only solution is for her to give up the plan.
zh: 唯一的解决办法就是让她放弃这个计划。

en: You never get something for nothing.
zh: 天下没有白吃的午餐。

en: You can't get anything for nothing.
zh: 天下没有白拿的东西。

en: One mistake will cost a person his life.
zh: 一次失误就可能丢了性命。

en: You probably just have a cold.
zh: 你大概只是感冒了。

en: It's just a trick of the wind.
zh: 只是风在捣鬼。

en: How about giving me a promotion from just-a-friend to boyfriend?
zh: 能不能把我从普通朋友升级成男朋友啊？

en: I would hate to become just a housewife.
zh: 我可不想只当个家庭主妇。

en: Not a word did he speak.
zh: 他一句话也没说。

en: You may have it for nothing.
zh: 这个可以白送你。

en: It was bad enough that he usually came to work late, but coming in drunk was the last straw, and I'm going to have to let him go.
zh: 他平时迟到也就算了，居然还喝醉了来上班，这我实在忍不了了，我得开除他。

en: You can have this book for nothing.
zh: 这本书可以白送给你。

en: I just felt like hearing the sound of your voice.
zh: 我就是想听听你的声音。

en: We must act at once.
zh: 我们得马上行动。

en: I want you to go to Osaka at once.
zh: 我要你立刻去大阪。

en: We must carry out the plan at once.
zh: 我们得马上执行计划。

en: He just drones on and on but hardly even touches on what we need to know for the test.
zh: 他一直在那儿啰啰唆唆的，可考试重点一点儿都没讲到。

en: If it does not rain.
zh: 只要不下雨的话。

en: However, you have to queue...
zh: 不过，你得排队……

en: All that I was looking for was somebody who looked like you.
zh: 我一直在找的，只是一个长得像你的人。

en: He lost his position just because he refused to tell a lie.
zh: 就因为不肯撒谎，他就丢了工作。

en: The line is busy now. Please hold the line.
zh: 电话占线，请别挂断。

en: The line is busy now.
zh: 电话占线。

en: He's gone to Nagoya on business.
zh: 他去名古屋出差了。

en: We're out of stock now.
zh: 现在没货了。

en: I will be with you right away.
zh: 我马上就来。

en: They are now sitting in conference on that question.
zh: 他们现在正开会讨论那个问题呢。

en: Appear before us now.
zh: 现在出现在我们面前。

en: The line is engaged.
zh: 电话占线。

en: I'm home, Mom!
zh: 妈，我回来了！

en: He came only as a witness to the light.
zh: 他来只是为了给光作证。

en: I just wish we could leave this horrible place.
zh: 我真希望咱们能离开这个鬼地方。

en: He who is afraid of asking is ashamed of learning.
zh: 怕问问题的人，其实是羞于学习。

en: I think it's worth asking.
zh: 我觉得值得问一下。

en: I don't want to be made a cat's paw.
zh: 我不想被人当枪使。

en: I think that it was probably Friday of last week.
zh: 我觉得大概是上周五。

en: She is not pretty, to be sure, but she is very clever.
zh: 她虽然不漂亮，但确实挺聪明的。

en: Indeed he is rich, but he is not reliable.
zh: 他确实很有钱，但人不太靠谱。

en: It's true that there are fewer children due to the falling birthrate, and there are fewer children in the school, but that is all to the good.
zh: 由于出生率下降，孩子确实变少了，学校里的学生也少了，但这也是件好事。

en: Flying a kite can be dangerous.
zh: 放风筝也可能有危险。

en: The kite went upward.
zh: 风筝飞上去了。

en: The octopus is in the sea.
zh: 章鱼在海里。

en: The kite got caught in the tree.
zh: 风筝挂在树上了。

en: But I never had you.
zh: 但我从未拥有过你。

en: But I have an appointment with my client tomorrow.
zh: 但我明天和客户有预约。

en: Takeshi promised to help me with my homework, but at the last minute he let me down.
zh: 武志答应帮我写作业，但最后关头他让我失望了。

en: Takeshi raised his hand to ask a question.
zh: 武志举手提了个问题。

en: Takeshi hopes to go to London to study English.
zh: 武志希望能去伦敦学英语。

en: Takeshi keeps a diary in English.
zh: 武志坚持用英语写日记。

en: Takeshi is making great progress with math.
zh: 武志的数学进步很大。

en: Takeo is quite a good fellow in his way.
zh: 武夫这人其实挺不错的。

en: Takeshi carried on his hard work.
zh: 武志继续努力工作。

en: Takeo is engrossed in solving mathematical problems.
zh: 武夫正埋头解数学题呢。

en: Takuya told me to start at once.
zh: 拓也让我马上出发。

en: Have you ever been to Hawaii, Takuya?
zh: 拓也，你去过夏威夷吗？

en: I will share with you in the cost of the taxi.
zh: 车费我跟你分摊。

en: It'll be quicker to walk than to take a taxi.
zh: 走路比打车快。

en: It's faster to reserve a taxi.
zh: 预约出租车会快一点。

en: I had a little difficulty in getting a taxi.
zh: 我打车有点费劲。

en: I had trouble getting a taxi.
zh: 我半天都没打到车。

en: I held up my hand to stop a taxi.
zh: 我伸手拦了一辆出租车。

en: It will cost at least 2000 yen to take a taxi.
zh: 打车起码得花两千日元。

en: Before we get out of the taxi, we pay the fare.
zh: 下出租车前，我们要先付钱。

en: Let's get out of the taxi.
zh: 我们下车吧。

en: Could you please get me a taxi?
zh: 能帮我叫辆出租车吗？

en: Will you please call me a taxi?
zh: 麻烦帮我叫辆车好吗？

en: Would you like me to get you a cab?
zh: 要我帮你叫辆车吗？

en: I'll call you a taxi.
zh: 我帮你叫辆出租车。

en: Would you like me to call a taxi?
zh: 需要我帮你叫辆车吗？

en: The taxi picked up two passengers.
zh: 出租车载了两个乘客。

en: The taxi stopped dead at the traffic signal.
zh: 出租车在红绿灯前猛地停住了。

en: What time does the cab leave for the airport?
zh: 出租车几点出发去机场？

en: The taxi seemed to go as slowly as a snail.
zh: 那辆出租车开得跟蜗牛爬一样慢。

en: No taxi stopped.
zh: 没有出租车停下来。

en: It was careless of you to leave your camera in the taxi.
zh: 你真粗心，把相机落在出租车上了。

en: If there weren't so many taxis, there would be fewer traffic accidents.
zh: 如果没那么多出租车，交通事故也会少一些。

en: If you want the taxi driver to have a tip, hand him too much money and say, "Keep the change."
zh: 如果你想给出租车司机小费，就多给他点钱，然后说“不用找了”。

en: Yesterday night, I shared a cab with Paris Hilton.
zh: 昨晚，我和帕丽斯·希尔顿拼了一辆出租车。

en: Let's take a taxi.
zh: 我们打车吧。

en: Why don't we take a taxi?
zh: 我们干嘛不打车呢？

en: Taking a taxi is a luxury for me.
zh: 打车对我来说太奢侈了。

en: Shall we take a taxi?
zh: 我们要打车吗？

en: It was careless of you to leave your umbrella in the taxi.
zh: 你真粗心，把伞落在出租车上了。

en: I left my umbrella in the cab.
zh: 我把伞落在出租车上了。

en: I would as soon walk as take a taxi.
zh: 我宁愿走路也不想打车。

en: Which is quicker, a taxi or the subway?
zh: 打车快还是坐地铁快？

en: Let's go by taxi, shall we?
zh: 我们打车去，好吗？

en: I would rather walk than go by taxi.
zh: 我宁可走路也不想打车。

en: I think you should go by taxi.
zh: 我觉得你应该打车去。

en: You ought to go by taxi, or you might not get there in time.
zh: 你该打个车，不然可能赶不上了。

en: It's more economical to go by bus instead of taking a taxi.
zh: 坐公交车比打车省钱。

en: The taxi has arrived.
zh: 出租车到了。

en: A taxi drew up at the main gate.
zh: 一辆出租车在正门口停了下来。

en: The taxi drew up to me.
zh: 出租车停在了我跟前。

en: As our taxi broke down on the way, we had to walk to the station.
zh: 我们的出租车半路坏了，只好走路去车站。

en: The taxi is waiting outside.
zh: 出租车在外面等着呢。

en: Taxis stood in a rank in front of the station.
zh: 车站前面停了一排出租车。

en: If there are no taxis, we'll have to walk.
zh: 要是没出租车，我们就得走路了。

en: There being no taxis available, we walked home.
zh: 因为打不到出租车，我们是走回家的。

en: As there was no taxi, I had to walk home.
zh: 因为没出租车，我只好走回家。

en: There being no taxis, I had to walk.
zh: 没出租车，我只能走路了。

en: I want a lot.
zh: 我想要很多。

en: It is nice to have a lot of friends.
zh: 朋友多真好。

en: There are many books, aren't there?
zh: 书挺多的，是吧？

en: I've had enough, so my stomach is full.
zh: 我吃饱了，肚子挺撑的。

en: The more you have, the more you want.
zh: 拥有的越多，想要的就越多。

en: There were lots of bundles, but they weren't thousand-dollar bills.
zh: 那里有一捆一捆的东西，但不是千元大钞。

en: You have made many mistakes.
zh: 你犯了好多错。

en: Lots of famous people come here.
zh: 很多名人都来这儿。

en: Many famous artists live in New York.
zh: 很多著名的艺术家都住在纽约。

en: A host of friends came to see me off.
zh: 一大群朋友来送我。

en: A lot of trees were cut down.
zh: 很多树被砍了。

en: Many a book is published, but of them only a very few are worth reading.
zh: 虽然出版的书很多，但值得读的没几本。

en: Though many books are published, hardly a few of them are of value.

zh: 你短时间内找不到更好的工作了。

en: He led a hard life after that.
zh: 那之后，他过得很辛苦。

en: I haven't seen her since then.
zh: 从那以后我就没见过她。

en: I cannot take less.
zh: 不能再少了。

en: It is far from easy to understand it.
zh: 理解它一点也不容易。

en: We need some clues to understand it.
zh: 我们需要一些线索来理解它。

en: To understand it, you have only to read this book.
zh: 想理解它，你只要读读这本书就行。

en: It's the animal in me that wants it.
zh: 是我体内的本能在渴望它。

en: Let it be done by six this evening.
zh: 今晚六点前把它做完。

en: Send it by mail.
zh: 寄快递吧。

en: Will you send it by mail?
zh: 你会寄快递过来吗？

en: Please bring it back tomorrow.
zh: 请明天把它带回来。

en: It was careless of her to forget it.
zh: 她居然把它忘了，真是太粗心了。

en: Just wrap it up.
zh: 把它包起来就行。

en: Let's get it over with.
zh: 咱们快点把它了结了吧。

en: Let me hear it.
zh: 让我听听。

en: I am sad to hear it.
zh: 听到这个我很伤心。

en: It made my blood boil to hear that.
zh: 听到那话我真是气炸了。

en: When she heard that, she turned pale.
zh: 她听到那个消息后，脸色变得煞白。

en: As soon as he heard of it, he hastened to the spot.
zh: 他一听说这事，就立刻赶到了现场。

en: She felt like crying upon hearing that.
zh: 听到那个，她想哭了。

en: I'm very sorry to hear that.
zh: 听到这个消息我很难过。

en: I'm very glad to hear that.
zh: 听到这个我很高兴。

en: I'm sorry to hear that.
zh: 听到这个我很遗憾。

en: I am indeed very glad to hear that.
zh: 听到那个我真的非常高兴。

en: My resolution was shaken when I heard about it.
zh: 听到这件事时，我的决心动摇了。

en: I'm sorry to hear it.
zh: 听到这个我挺难受的。

en: I sighed with relief to hear it.
zh: 听到这个，我如释重负。

en: I am very much relieved to know that.
zh: 知道那个消息后，我心里踏实多了。

en: I'm so sorry to hear that.
zh: 听到这个消息我很难过。

en: I'd like to see that in black and white.
zh: 我想看白纸黑字的证据。

en: In order to share it, we'll have to tear it into two pieces.
zh: 为了平分，咱们得把它撕成两半。

en: Will you explain it in plain English?
zh: 你能用大白话解释一下吗？

en: I will keep it in my bosom.
zh: 我会把它记在心里的。

en: Cut it in half.
zh: 把它切成两半。

en: Don't blame it on her.
zh: 别怪她。

en: He has enough money to buy it.
zh: 他有足够的钱买它。

en: I have no money to buy it.
zh: 我没钱买。

en: It cost him five pounds to buy it back.
zh: 他花了五英镑把它买回来。

en: He makes no bones about admitting it.
zh: 他承认得很干脆。

en: Even if I admit that, I cannot agree with you.
zh: 就算我承认这一点，我也没法同意你的看法。

en: I don't know how to put it in Japanese.
zh: 我不知道日语怎么说。

en: We use them often as parasols or umbrellas.
zh: 我们经常把它们当作阳伞或雨伞。

en: He was caught in the very act of stealing it.
zh: 他偷东西的时候被抓了个正着。

en: May I try it on?
zh: 我可以试穿一下吗？

en: Why don't you look it up in the phone book?
zh: 你干嘛不在电话簿里查查？

en: There are few men who don't know that.
zh: 没几个人不知道这事。

en: There is no one but knows it.
zh: 没人不知道这事。

en: He is not such a fool but he knows it.
zh: 他还没傻到连这都不知道。

en: Had I known that, I wouldn't have said such a thing to her.
zh: 我要是早知道，就不会对她说那样的话了。

en: Give it to anyone you like.
zh: 你想给谁就给谁吧。

en: Please have someone else do that.
zh: 请找别人做那件事吧。

en: Say it in another way.
zh: 换个说法吧。

en: I'd like to have that gift wrapped.
zh: 我想把那份礼物包一下。

en: Put it back in the nest.
zh: 把它放回窝里去。

en: You ought to have told me that before.
zh: 你早该告诉我了。

en: I believe it to be true.
zh: 我相信那是真的。

en: Let's make it brief.
zh: 咱们长话短说吧。

en: It's naive of you to believe that.
zh: 你居然相信那个，也太天真了。

en: It was stupid of me to believe that!
zh: 我居然相信了，真蠢！

en: Can you prove it?
zh: 你能证明吗？

en: May I eat a little of it?
zh: 我能吃一点吗？

en: I cannot help but laugh at it.
zh: 我忍不住想笑。

en: All you have to do is write it down.
zh: 你只要把它写下来就行了。

en: It took me several hours to write it.
zh: 我花了好几个小时才写好。

en: I had difficulty in having it repaired.
zh: 把它修好可费了我不少劲。

en: Having finished it, he went to bed.
zh: 做完之后他就睡觉去了。

en: It is next to impossible to carry it out.
zh: 想要实施它几乎是不可能的。

en: Get it, and put it on the fire.
zh: 拿上它，扔到火里去。

en: Prove it by experiment.
zh: 用实验来证明它吧。

en: I found it difficult to put it into practice.
zh: 我发现把它付诸实践很难。

en: While I was at it, I felt as if I was walking on thin ice.
zh: 做那件事的时候，我感觉如履薄冰。

en: He can't be smart if he can screw up something like that.
zh: 能把这种事搞砸，他肯定聪明不到哪儿去。

en: Look it up in the dictionary.
zh: 查查字典吧。

en: I need a bag to carry it in.
zh: 我需要个袋子把它装着。

en: Lay it down on paper so everyone understands better.
zh: 把它写在纸上，这样大家能看得更明白。

en: Bring it to me.
zh: 把它给我拿过来。

en: That's just what I was going to say.
zh: 我正想说这个呢。

en: Bring it back to me.
zh: 把它还给我。
